name: action-continuous-translation
description: This action uses GitHub Models and remark to translate markdown document incrementally in your repository.

scripts.postinstall: npm run fix && npm run ruler
scripts.upgrade: npx -y npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm run fix
scripts.test:build: cd docs && npm run build && cd ../test/root-no-base && npm run build
scripts.dev:readme: genaiscript run translator README.md -x glossaryFile=./glossary.md -x instructionsFile=./instructions.md -x lang=fr -x translationsDir=translations-dev
scripts.dev:long: genaiscript run translator test/long.md -x glossaryFile=./glossary.md -x instructionsFile=./instructions.md -x lang=fr -x translationsDir=translations-dev
scripts.dev:links: genaiscript run translator test/links.md -x glossaryFile=./glossary.md -x instructionsFile=./instructions.md -x lang=fr -x translationsDir=translations-dev
scripts.dev:image: genaiscript run translator test/image.md -x glossaryFile=./glossary.md -x instructionsFile=./instructions.md -x lang=fr -x translationsDir=translations-dev
scripts.release: npx changeset version && npm install && git add . && git commit -m "[chore] release" && git push
scripts.translate: genaiscript run translator README.md "docs/src/content/**/*" -x "lang=fr,es,pt-br,ar" --no-run-trace -x starlightDir=docs starlightBase=action-continuous-translation -x glossaryFile=./glossary.md -x instructionsFile=./instructions.md
